name: Showdown bot
description: A Pokemon Showdown Battle Bot written in Python

WEBSOCKET_URI.description: The address to use to connect to the Pokemon Showdown websocket

BOT_MODE.description: The mode the the bot will operate in. Options are CHALLENGE_USER, SEARCH_LADDER, or ACCEPT_CHALLENGE

POKEMON_MODE.description: The type of game this bot will play games in

RUN_COUNT.description: The amount of games this bot will play before quitting
